category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ODS_multiprocess_initial_subprocess_count
preference.preference_description: Determines the number of subprocesses created and logged into the database by the parent Object Directory Services (ODS) process at startup.If too few subprocesses are created, remote users may notice a delay due to the time required to create a subprocess and log on to the database. If too many subprocesses are created, strain may be placed on system resources, resulting in slow performance. Valid Values: Any positive integer.
